name: The Patagonians
description:
The events of this terrible night began ten years ago.
However, today they will overtake you and make you remember the promise made once.
Rushing to find your missing daughter, you will become participants in terrible events.
But this time it won't be possible to retreat.

The Patagonians is a 2D horror adventure inspired by horror movies from the 80s and 90s.
You have to explore creepy and unpleasant locations filled with disgusting monsters.
At the beginning of the journey, you will only have a torch in service.
So sometimes the best solution to save your own life is to run away.
To top it off, huge guardian bosses will stand in your way.
Their main task is not to let you into the lair of the Patagonians.
To win you will have to show ingenuity and patience.
Get ready! It will be very difficult.
What awaits you at the end of this story?
I'll leave it up to you to find out for yourself.

Waiting for you:

  • Original 2D graphics.
  • Atmospheric environment.
  • 3 zones and more than 20 locations.
  • 11 types of deadly enemies.
  • Simple controls.

Explore locations, look for clues, solve puzzles, fight dangerous enemies or flee, destroy obstacles.
Do whatever is necessary to reach your goal.
